snippet: The home improvement chain said it had fired the people who sent a Twitter message that was criticized as being racially insensitive.
abstract: Home Depot apologizes after message sent from company's primary Twitter account is criticized as racially insensitive; home improvement chain says it has fired employees who sent tweet.
lead_paragraph: The home improvement chain said it had fired the people who sent a Twitter message that was criticized as being racially insensitive.

headline.main: Home Depot Apologizes for a Tweet That Offends
